# A2I-Insights — Auto-Generated Dashboards

**Purpose:**
A2I-Insights provides **executive dashboards and automated KPI reporting**, enabling data-driven decision-making across enterprise operations and cybersecurity workflows.

**Features:**

* Executive dashboards with KPI visualization
* Automated reporting and narrative summaries
* Interactive charts and trend analysis
* Integration with structured and simulated data sources

**Tech Stack:**

* Python, Pandas, Plotly, Streamlit
* SQL / PostgreSQL / simulated datasets
* Dockerized deployment for reproducibility

**Usage:**

```bash
# Clone the repo
git clone https://github.com/atsuvovor/CyberThreat-Insight.git

# Navigate to A2I-Insights
cd CyberThreat-Insight/A2I-Insights

# Run the dashboard demo
streamlit run dashboards_demo.py
```
